title: Award for Curriculum Development in Medical Schools
description: This award is given to outstanding undergraduate medical and osteopathic school programs for incorporating issues related to spirituality and medicine into their curricula. Click on school names for descriptions of their programs.
sitename: GWish | GW School of Medicine and Health Sciences
cleaned_text: This award is given to outstanding undergraduate medical and osteopathic school programs for incorporating issues related to spirituality and medicine into their curricula.
